messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Name: Resonite Game Pack
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Descript:
This Game Pack for MonkeyLoader provides basic hooks for modding the game Resonite, which uses FrooxEngine.
It provides hooks for the beginning of initialization, when initialization is done, and when the game shuts down.
messages.MonkeyLoader.GamePacks.Resonite.Unity.De: This Game Pack for MonkeyLoader provides additional hooks for the Unity version of Resonite (as opposed to the Headless server).
